page.title: 14A WEEK-END AT OVERY
page.content: One Saturday morning when I was staying with my friend for the week-end she took me to see her friend Zoe and we had dinner. She then showed me the marsh, creek and the harbour. We went to the playing field for a little while and then we went home as it was getting dark. I had tea at their house, then we played and went to bed. The next morning we went to get our boat ready for sailing in the afternoon. After dinner we went with my friend's dad to go sailing. We put on life jackets and went to fetch the speed boat. We had a ride until dark. We went home and had a bath and had tea. We played until my mum and dad came and then we went to fetch my sister from her friend's house and we drove home.
